channel.title: Dreamweaver, Flash, Photoshop and More Tutorials
channel.description:
Hi,
How are you? Have you ever wondered how people make really good web pages, or cool graphics? They use programs such as Macromedia Dreamweaver, Fireworks and Flash, Photoshop and some other ones. Many people like using these handy programs because once you learn how they work, they will be fun to use, and will be useful in the future. It takes some time to learn how to use these programs; you can’t expect to learn everything within a day. Anyway, once you learn the basics it will be really easy, and within a matter of days, or weeks you will became a professional. You don’t need to take a Web Design class, or any other classes related to this topic because you will learn just about everything from this page.
Well now to the point. I wanted to start a thread where everyone could participate. The goal is to get over 50 tutorials that will help you learn more about using these programs. The tutorials are broken into three groups: Basic, Intermediate, and Advanced. Once again, I would appreciate it if everyone would contribute to this thread. It will be like a group project.
If you wish to help out by posting some tutorials, please post them in this format so I can easily add them to this page.
[u][b]Format[/b][/u] [code] Pick a category: Dreamweaver, Flash, Photoshop, or All. Choose a skill level: Basic, Intermediate, or Advanced. Download it from [url=http://]name of the tutorial[/url].[/code]
[size=12pt][i][b]Dreamweaver[/b][/i][/size]
[u][b]Basic[/b][/u] [url=http://www.haverford.edu/acc/docs/software/dreamweaver/welcome.htm]Dreamweaver Basics[/url] [url=http://www.dwfaq.com/Tutorials/Basics/default.asp]Basic Dreamweaver Tutorials[/url]
---------------------------
[u][b]Intermediate[/b][/u]
---------------------------
[u][b]Advanced[/b][/u] [url=http://www.tutorialized.com/tutorials/Dreamweaver/1]Lots of Topics Tutorial[/url]
---------------------------
[size=12pt][i][b]Flash[/b][/i][/size]
[u][b]Basic[/b][/u] [url=http://www.learnflash.com/mentorbegin.html] Helpful Video Tutorial[/url]
---------------------------
[u][b]Intermediate[/b][/u] [url=http://learnflash.com/419802intadv.html]Intermediate/Advanced Video Tutorial[/url]
---------------------------
[u][b]Advanced[/b][/u] [url=http://learnflash.com/419802intadv.html]Intermediate/Advanced Video Tutorial[/url]
---------------------------
[size=12pt][i][b]Photoshop[/b][/i][/size]
[u][b]Basic[/b][/u]
---------------------------
[u][b]Intermediate[/b][/u]
---------------------------
[u][b]Advanced[/b][/u] [url=http://www.photoshopsupport.com/tutorials/cs2-photoshop-9.html]Tips, Graphics, Hacks, and Video Tutorials[/url]
---------------------------
[size=12pt][i][b]All[/b][/i][/size]
[u][b]Basic[/b][/u] [url=http://www.cbtcafe.com/dreamweaver/index.htm]Dreamweaver, Flash, and Photoshop Basic Tutorial[/url]
---------------------------
[u][b]Intermediate[/b][/u]
---------------------------
[u][b]Advanced[/b][/u]
---------------------------
Thanks for taking time to read this.
Your friend, Leader
It doesn't look like much right now, but when we are finished with it, it will look really good. Anyone like it? Well have to go study for tests. Later mates

item.title: Dreamweaver, Flash, Photoshop and More Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

Basic, also you can go here for a few free basic, intermediate, and advanced tutorials - basic here: http://www.learnflash.com/mentorbegin.html

Intermediate + Advanced here: http://learnflash.com/419802intadv.html

Just look to the right at “Free flash tutorials”. Their all video tutorials there.

Read full topic
